net.proteusframework.core.notification

Class HTMLNotificationRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.notification.AbstractNotificationRenderer
      • net.proteusframework.core.notification.HTMLNotificationRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationRenderer

    public class HTMLNotificationRenderer
extends AbstractNotificationRenderer
    NotificationRenderer that outputs HTML.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • withDetailElement

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withDetailElement(@Nonnull
                                         Element element,
                                         @Nullable
                                         Map<String,String> attributes)
        Set the element for each notification detail. By default, the HTMLElement.div element is output.
        Parameters:
        element - the element. Example: HTMLElement.div
        attributes - optional attributes. "id" attribute is ignored since it must be unique.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withDetailElement

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withDetailElement(@Nonnull
                                         Element element,
                                         @Nullable
                                         String htmlClass)
        Set the element rendered for each notification detail. By default, the HTMLElement.div element is output.
        Parameters:
        element - the element. Example: HTMLElement.div
        htmlClass - optional HTML class.
        Returns:
        this.

        Parameters:

        attributes - optional attributes. "id" attribute is ignored since it must be unique.

      • withNotificationTypeHTMLClass

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withNotificationTypeHTMLClass(@Nonnull
                                                     NotificationType type,
                                                     @Nullable
                                                     String htmlClass)
        Set the HTML Class to output for the specified Notification type. Defaults are provided for all types.
        Parameters:
        type - the type.
        htmlClass - the HTML class. May be null to prevent the output of any class for a type.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withRenderDetails

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withRenderDetails(boolean flag)
        Set the XHTML rendering flag. By default, this is true.
        Parameters:
        flag - the flag.
        Returns:
        this.
        See Also:
        AbstractNotificationRenderer.setRenderDetails(boolean)

      • withRenderEvenOddHTMLClass

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withRenderEvenOddHTMLClass(boolean flag)
        Set the even/odd rendering flag. By default, the renderer outputs even and odd class names.
        Parameters:
        flag - the flag.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withRenderXHTML

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withRenderXHTML(boolean flag)
        Set the XHTML rendering flag. By default, this is false.
        Parameters:
        flag - the flag.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withWrappingElement

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withWrappingElement(@Nonnull
                                           Element wrappingElement,
                                           @Nullable
                                           Map<String,String> attributes)
        Set the wrapping element for the notifications. By default, no wrapping element is output.
        Parameters:
        wrappingElement - the element. Example: HTMLElement.div
        attributes - optional attributes.
        Returns:
        this.

      • withWrappingElement

        public HTMLNotificationRenderer withWrappingElement(@Nonnull
                                           Element wrappingElement,
                                           @Nullable
                                           String htmlID,
                                           @Nullable
                                           String htmlClass)
        Set the wrapping element for the notifications. By default, no wrapping element is output.
        Parameters:
        wrappingElement - the element. Example: HTMLElement.div
        htmlID - optional HTML id.
        htmlClass - optional HTML class.
        Returns:
        this.
